main event: Observers reported seeing a metallic, circular object in the sky that emitted a bright light and displayed movement characteristics similar to a meteorite.
interesting points: The object appeared to circle in a dull state before brightening as if ignited., It was compared to the brightness of a meteorite or shooting star., Observers described the object as having a silvery metallic color., The object remained in sight for about 75 minutes., Handwritten notes indicated that the object changed colors and appeared luminous and round.
sighted object: metallic circular object emitting a bright light
witness description: two observers in the area; specific details redacted
